titocc.compiler.elements

Class Statement

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.compiler.elements.CodeElement
      • titocc.compiler.elements.Statement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockStatement, DeclarationStatement, ExpressionStatement, IfStatement, ReturnStatement, WhileStatement

    public abstract class Statement
extends CodeElement
    Abstract base for all statements.

    EBNF definition:
    STATEMENT = EXPRESSION_STATEMENT | DECLARATION_STATEMENT | IF_STATEMENT | WHILE_STATEMENT | BLOCK_STATEMENT | RETURN_STATEMENT | ";"

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Statement(int line, int column)
      Constructs a Statement.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statement

        public Statement(int line,
         int column)
        Constructs a Statement.
        Parameters:
        line - starting line number of the statement
        column - starting column/character of the statement

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public abstract void compile(Assembler asm,
           Scope scope,
           Registers regs)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             SyntaxException
        Generates assembly code for the statement.
        Parameters:
        asm - assembler used for code generation
        scope - scope in which the statement is evaluated
        regs - available registers; must have at least one active register
        Throws:
        SyntaxException - if statement contains an error
        java.io.IOException - if assembler throws

      • parse

        public static Statement parse(TokenStream tokens)
        Attempts to parse statement from token stream. If parsing fails the stream is reset to its initial position.
        Parameters:
        tokens - source token stream
        Returns:
        Statement object or null if tokens don't form a valid statement
